titles.title: Requiring an affirmative vote of a majority of the Members present and voting, a quorum being present, on final passage of House Joint Resolution 17.
Requiring an affirmative vote of a majority of the Members present and voting, a quorum being present, on final passage of House Joint Resolution 17.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 233, H. Res. 232 is considered passed House.

bill.summary: This resolution requires a majority vote of the Members present and voting, a quorum being present, on final passage of H.J.Res. 17 (eliminating the deadline for the ratification of the Equal Rights Amendment, which prohibits discrimination based on sex).
